name: Project 1: Mamma Mia
info: This was my first group project. We designed a website to help fun lovers find entertainment events in their city of choice!

name: Project 2: Recipe Box
info: This was my second group project. Our group all had fond memories of our moms having a recipe box with cards and hand written recipes that she would pull out and we would bake or cook together. This application utilizes full-stack web development as well as CRUD to create this website. We made everything! Front and back!
